<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>

Envía un mensaje de texto a un número de WhatsApp

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["number","text"],"properties":{"number":{"type":"string","example":"51929088138","description":"Número de destino en formato internacional sin el +"},"text":{"type":"string","example":"Hola hola","description":"Mensaje de texto a enviar"}},"title":"TextMessage"},"examples":{"ejemplo1":{"summary":"Mensaje simple","value":{"number":"51929088138","text":"Hola hola"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Mensaje enviado correctamente","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"success":{"type":"boolean"},"message":{"type":"string"}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Error en el envío"},"401":{"description":"No autorizado"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
